DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of the investigational drug ACU-4429 in subjects with geographic atrophy.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of ACU-4429 in Subjects With Geographic Atrophy
DOC.criteria: Have a clinical diagnosis of geographic atrophy, as defined in the protocol Currently receiving or has received a medication prohibited by the protocol
